comments.body: Why do we still need the `networkHost` (i.e., a back channel to kubelet) now that host port support has been added to CRI? https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/v1.6.0-alpha.1/pkg/kubelet/networks.go#L27
I think the naming here is confusing. The criNetworkHost is not actually used by CRI shims, but used by the good old kubelet runtime.
The naming is confusing and I can't seem to remember what it's used for. Should probably clarify this in the comment or just rename it. Not a blocker for this PR though.
